title: 04/01/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 04/01/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On today’s Dan Patrick Show, the boys reacted to all the moving and shaking that happened in sports. As the major pro days concluded, Pro Football Focus’ Mike Renner joined the show to talk about Mac Jones and his likely landing spot with San Francisco. UCLA’s head coach Mick Cronin called in to talk about how his team was able to make the adjustment to make it to the Final Four. Lastly, as he the new Captain American, actor Wyatt Russell joined Dan in the final hour to talk about his new role.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
On today’s Dan Patrick Show, the boys reacted to all the moving and shaking that happened in sports. As the major pro days concluded, Pro Football Focus’ Mike Renner joined the show to talk about Mac Jones and his likely landing spot with San Francisco. UCLA’s head coach Mick Cronin called in to talk about how his team was able to make the adjustment to make it to the Final Four. Lastly, as he the new Captain American, actor Wyatt Russell joined Dan in the final hour to talk about his new role.
